title: BP Tea: Formula for Blood Pressure | Vedic Health
description: The medicinal herbs in this formula have been shown to help with:High blood pressure, cardiovascular health. 100% organic and non-GMO. Premium quality loose whole dried herbs. No added flavors, additives or preservatives. Hand-crafted in small batches to ensure the highest potency and freshness. Detailed instructions to make decoctions and brews will be sent with your tea package.
